original_title: Beware the Moon: Remembering 'An American Werewolf in London'
overview: Host Paul Davis takes a trip through some of the iconic backdrops of John Landis' 1981 werewolf classic An American Werewolf In London. The original cast and crew tell the story of how the film was made over a quarter of a century ago featuring rare footage and never before seen photos.
title: Beware the Moon: Remembering 'An American Werewolf in London'
